text: "You Want It Darker" is a single by Canadian poet and musician Leonard Cohen. It was released on October 21, 2016, three weeks before Cohen's death. The song is the title track from Cohen's album You Want It Darker. It earned Cohen a Grammy Award for Best Rock Performance. ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:Leonard Cohen songs Category:Songs written by Leonard Cohen
title: You Want It Darker (song)
